articles.title: Rogers rebrands 680 NEWS, other Canadian radio stations as CityNews - CityNews Toronto
articles.description: In December 2020, Rogers Sports & Media announced a similar rebrand of 1310 NEWS in Ottawa, which became CityNews Ottawa & The Valley.
articles.content: Rogers Sports & Media announced Friday that its news radio stations – including Toronto’s 680 NEWS – will be rebranded under CityNews to “become a powerhouse local news offering in each market.”… [+2236 chars]
